text: hi … quick one: is there a way to convert a global module to a regular one? or even clone the module to a regular module?
you can do it with global groups so I would guess you could with global modules. you may have to do it from a drag n drop template if you’re working in coded templates
I don’t think there’s currently a way to do this. I ended up recreating all the modules … fortunatly i only had 3 with a resonable number of fields :slightly_smiling_face:

i couldn’t find a way … so i recreated everything. I made the mistake to make my starting module, on which the rest are based, a global module my accident … so i ended up with 3 global modules :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m not doing gonna use the drag and drop :slightly_smiling_face:
well, it’s usually helpful to have a dummy drag n drop as it allows you to do somethings you can’t do or can’t do as easily in coded templates
when i started using HubSpot about 4 years ago I was all about using the drag and drop template builder … but since the new design manager update last year, no more drag and drop

Hey AJ! I did a little digging on this, the Forms team say there isn't currently a beta for regex form field validation, were you talking about the Marketing Forms app, or validation on custom module fields?
I think I was thinking about the validation on custom modules and consumed them.
Is there any plans to add validation to forms like that? It's a common request we get from clients to have form validation on text and number fields.
